initial.text: "Welcome to Dome City, Agent. This is where we start over and the chance for liberty begins."

official.online: "Refreshed, the official server is online, Agent."
official.offline: "Refreshed, the official server is offline or your network connection is unstable, Agent."

private.text: "Now, we can't make a private server, no one has the server-side files, but you can help us to recreate them, Agent."
